name: Healthyfied omurice
description: Indulge in this Healthyfied omurice, a delicious low-carb and low-sugar twist on the traditional Japanese omelette rice. Made with keto-friendly ingredients, this dish perfectly blends healthy eating with mouthwatering flavors, making it an ideal choice for those seeking nutritious yet satisfying meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Shirataki Noodles by rinsing them under cold water and boiling for 2 minutes. Then, drain and set aside to dry.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, whisk the eggs until well beaten.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half a tablespoon of butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat. Pour in the eggs and cook for 2-3 minutes until the omelette is just set. Carefully fold the omelette in half and then slide it onto a plate.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In the same skillet, add the remaining butter and saut√© the prepared Shirataki Noodles for about 5 minutes, or until they begin to slightly brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the Keto Ketchup with the noodles, mixing well to ensure the noodles are evenly coated. Cook for an additional 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place the noodle mixture on the plate and gently fold the omelette over the top. Serve immediately for a warm, comforting meal.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
